card.name: Sacellum Godspeaker
card.property: {T}: Reveal any number of creature cards with power 5 or greater from your hand. Add {G} for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her connection to the gargantuans puts her in line to become Anima, a sacred but daunting duty.

card.name: Thunder-Thrash Elder
card.property: Devour 3 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viashino thrashes are led by elders who have survived countless challenges.

card.name: Cathartic Adept
card.property: {T}: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

card.name: Resounding Wave
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Cycling {5}{W}{U}{B} ({5}{W}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Resounding Wave, return two target permanents to their owners' hands.

card.name: Angel's Herald
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}, Sacrifice a green creature, a white creature, and a blue creature: Search your library for a card named Empyrial Archangel and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rigorous faith and belief are rewarded on occasion, and richly so.

card.name: Spearbreaker Behemoth
card.property: Indestructible {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few Nayans dare hunt the gargantuans. They're regarded not as animals but as forces of nature, like landslides or typhoons.

card.name: Elspeth, Knight-Errant
card.property: +1: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. +1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

card.name: Soul's Might
card.property: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

card.name: Gift of the Gargantuan
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sedris, the Traitor King
card.property: Each creature card in your graveyard has unearth {2}{B}. ({2}{B}: Return the card to the battlefield. The creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He bids his minions rise from their graves to their knees.

card.name: Behemoth's Herald
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a red creature, a green creature, and a white creature: Search your library for a card named Godsire and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mine is an insatiable god, with appetites as magnificent as the jungle itself."

card.name: Viashino Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}, Discard a card: Regenerate Viashino Skeleton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underneath the Dregscape lay the remains of creatures long extinct from Grixis.

card.name: Branching Bolt
card.property: Choose one or both — • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Sharuum the Hegemon
card.property: Flying When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On our thirty-fourth day of digging, we unearthed a chamber that contained the intact remains of several species long extinct from Grixis. One in particular should make a fine siege engine . . . ." —Last notes of Shungus Nod, fleshcrafter

card.name: Kathari Screecher
card.property: Flying Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Undead Leotau
card.property: {R}: Undead Leotau gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Immortal Coil
card.property: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draw a card. If damage would be dealt to you, prevent that damage. Exile a card from your graveyard for each 1 damage prevented this way. When there are no cards in your graveyard, you lose the game.

card.name: Sigil of Distinction
card.property: Sigil of Distinction enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Sigil of Distinction. Equip—Remove a charge counter from Sigil of Distinction.

card.name: Sphinx's Herald
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Sacrifice a white creature, a blue creature, and a black creature: Search your library for a card named Sphinx Sovereign and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He calls a riddle through the gaps of cloven clouds, hoping for an answer.

card.name: Onyx Goblet
card.property: {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblet was a gift from the sphinx Gorael, who hoped humans and vedalken would eventually destroy each other to acquire it, leaving all of Esper to her own kind.

card.name: Bant Panorama
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Bant Panorama: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.

card.name: Invincible Hymn
card.property: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bantians believe those who are born into the highest caste and live a life of discipline and virtue can ascend to become angels.

card.name: Quietus Spike
Bant Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library. • Counter target instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant is a world where death and chaos hold no sway.

card.name: Shadowfeed
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The future is a snake, devouring your life backwards through time. And when you die, believe me, it doesn't stop feeding." —Sedris, the Traitor King

card.name: Master of Etherium
card.property: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each mutation causes the incurables to look vastly different from one another. They are left with only one thing in common: their insatiable lust for the slaughter.

card.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
card.property: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

card.name: Jund Panorama
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky is the dragon's throne, the seat from which it issues its fiery decrees.

card.name: Demon's Herald
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a blue creature, a black creature, and a red creature: Search your library for a card named Prince of Thralls and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May these deaths be the first of many."

card.name: Sangrite Surge
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some believe the spiky crystal called sangrite is concentrated dragon's breath. Others think it's crystallized life energy. The clans care only about the power it unleashes when crushed.

card.name: Keeper of Progenitus
card.property: Whenever a player taps a Mountain, Forest, or Plains for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He watches over the valley where Progenitus sleeps, culling signs from its steaming breaths.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
card.property: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Tower Gargoyle
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance." —Tezzeret

card.name: Fleshbag Marauder
card.property: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

card.name: Knight-Captain of Eos
card.property: When Knight-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. {W}, Sacrifice a Soldier: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of Bant's caste system is the unfailing loyalty of its meekest members.

card.name: Qasali Ambusher
card.property: Reach If a creature is attacking you and you control a Forest and a Plains, you may cast Qasali Ambusher without paying its mana cost and as though it had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The surprise of a battle cry can be as deadly as a blade.

card.name: Mycoloth
card.property: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each +1/+1 counter on Mycoloth.

card.name: Cunning Lethemancer
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me your memories, and you will have release from the suffering they bring you."

card.name: Scourge Devil
card.property: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mighty Emergence
card.property: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Angelic Benediction
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even in single combat, I am never alone." —Rafiq of the Many

card.name: Bloodthorn Taunter
card.property: Haste {T}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Naya's celebrants stoke the gargantuans into a rage, loosing a tide of muscle with the precision of an arrow.

card.name: Arcane Sanctum
card.property: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes." —Tullus of Palandius

card.name: Hindering Light
card.property: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries of careful practice have elevated the casting of protective spells to an art form. What little offensive magic remains on Bant stands little chance of breaching them.

card.name: Blister Beetle
card.property: When Blister Beetle enters the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warriors of the Rip Clan wear their beetle-acid scars proudly, even modifying clothing and armor to better display the trophy.

card.name: Sharding Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

card.name: Outrider of Jhess
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The island nation of Jhess is under constant siege from Valeron on the mainland. Riders traverse the coastline, always on the lookout for sails or aven.

card.name: Sigiled Paladin
card.property: First strike Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each sigil marks the recognition of a great deed and signifies a duty owed to the one who granted it.

card.name: Infest
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." —Rannon, Vithian holdout

card.name: Drumhunter
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

card.name: Glaze Fiend
card.property: Flying Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

card.name: Steelclad Serpent
card.property: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium." —Lodus of the Ethersworn

card.name: Hellkite Overlord
card.property: Flying, trample, haste {R}: Hellkite Overlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {B}{G}: Regenerate Hellkite Overlord.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dragon has no pretense of compassion, no false mask of civilization—just hunger, heat, and need." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Stoic Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.

card.name: Goblin Mountaineer
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin lairs sit high in Jund's mountains. This gives the goblins easy access to the sacrificial peaks above and lets them build up a head of steam before attacking prey down below.

card.name: Lich's Mirror
card.property: If you would lose the game, instead shuffle your hand, your graveyard, and all permanents you own into your library, then draw seven cards and your life total becomes 20.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shows not what you are but what you were.

card.name: Swerve
card.property: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't beat the necromancers in numbers or raw power. We must beat them with ingenuity and timing." —Rannon, Vithian holdout

card.name: Rhox Charger
card.property: Trample Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Druid of the Anima
card.property: {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the Anima herself remains at the Sacellum, her druids roam Naya, collecting mana bonds with every location in the world.

card.name: Filigree Sages
card.property: {2} {U}: Untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We of the Sanctum Arcanum have pondered every word on every page of the Filigree Texts. If you can't say the same, don't bother speaking."

card.name: Knight of the White Orchid
card.property: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both guide and guard on open plain.

card.name: Cavern Thoctar
card.property: {1} {R}: Cavern Thoctar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Natives of Naya know better than to loiter near the mouth of a cave. Two glowing red eyes and the stench of foul breath are all the warning you're likely to get.

card.name: Ethersworn Canonist
card.property: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

card.name: Kederekt Creeper
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bloated with venom, it crawls Grixis looking for victims to ooze onto.

card.name: Goblin Deathraiders
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

card.name: Godtoucher
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature with power 5 or greater this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gargantuans die not in moments but in moons. There is still time to aid this noble ancient."

card.name: Gather Specimens
card.property: If a creature would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, it enters the battlefield under your control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is." —Xorin, Architect of Will

card.name: Dragon Fodder
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

card.name: Steward of Valeron
card.property: Vigilance {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

card.name: Caldera Hellion
card.property: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Caldera Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature.

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A circle of light and a word of confinement.

card.name: Skullmulcher
card.property: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Skullmulcher enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature it devoured.

card.name: Fire-Field Ogre
card.property: First strike Unearth {U}{B}{R} ({U}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Obelisk of Bant
card.property: {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether incorporated into the structure of castles or admired as lone symbols, the obelisks stand for Bant's values of loyalty, honor, and truth.

card.name: Thoughtcutter Agent
card.property: {U} {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life and reveals their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Agents of the Architects of Will mark their victims as a reminder that their secrets are secret no longer.

card.name: Vicious Shadows
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you may have Vicious Shadows deal damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thrashes of the ancient past still linger in spirit and shadow, desperate to sink their claws into our souls." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Guardians of Akrasa
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe." —Elspeth

card.name: Obelisk of Grixis
card.property: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From her sunsail tent high above the forest floor, an elf harkener can hear the footfalls of a single creature through the cacophony of Naya's jungle sounds.

card.name: Lightning Talons
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is going to hurt a lot, but on the bright side, you'll be dead soon." —Sedris, the Traitor King

card.name: Tortoise Formation
card.property: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.

card.name: Volcanic Submersion
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dragon's death is almost as feared as its life. Old, dying dragons throw themselves into volcanoes, causing massive upheaval and widespread disaster.

card.name: Titanic Ultimatum
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, trample, and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Retribution is best delivered by claws and rage, with both magnified." —Ajani

card.name: Shore Snapper
card.property: {U}: Shore Snapper gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kathari, the sickly aven of Grixis, have learned that the corpses by the shoreline are more trap than treat.

card.name: Obelisk of Esper
card.property: {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a monument as austere, unyielding, and inscrutable as Esper itself.

card.name: Resounding Silence
card.property: Exile target attacking creature. Cycling {5}{G}{W}{U} ({5}{G}{W}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Resounding Silence, exile up to two target attacking creatures.

card.name: Puppet Conjurer
card.property: {U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Homunculus artifact creature token. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Homunculus.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He scowls at his imperfect creation, then crushes it to scrap. He salvages the etherium and begins anew.

card.name: Ranger of Eos
card.property: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

card.name: Naya Panorama
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Naya Panorama: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Between the thunderous footfalls of Naya's behemoths lie moments of perfect quiet.

card.name: Sphinx Sovereign
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your end step, you gain 3 life if Sphinx Sovereign is untapped. Otherwise, each opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What rises without legs, whispers without a voice, bites without teeth, and dies without having life?"

card.name: Skeletonize
card.property: Skeletonize deals 3 damage to target creature. When a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire burns away both flesh and freedom.

card.name: Ajani Vengeant
card.property: +1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. −2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. −7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

card.name: Kresh the Bloodbraided
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kresh the Bloodbraided, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.property: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

card.name: Kederekt Leviathan
card.property: When Kederekt Leviathan enters the battlefield, return all other nonland permanents to their owners' hands. Unearth {6}{U} ({6}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Resounding Scream
card.property: Target player discards a card at random. Cycling {5}{U}{B}{R} ({5}{U}{B}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Resounding Scream, target player discards two cards at random.

card.name: Archdemon of Unx
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Zombie creature, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The necropolis at Unx was once a living city, its streets untrodden by death.

card.name: Topan Ascetic
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Topan Ascetic gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Monks from Topa wander all of Bant, encouraging the Unbeholden to find their place in society through honorable combat.

card.name: Rakeclaw Gargantuan
card.property: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Naya teems with gargantuans, titanic monsters to whom both nature and civilization defer.

card.name: Scourglass
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Scourglass: Destroy all permanents except for artifacts and lands. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soon I will sleep, eyes closing to a world tarnished with flesh, and then wake to a polished vision." —Sharuum

card.name: Jungle Shrine
card.property: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

card.name: Necrogenesis
card.property: {2}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those may be the squirms of one life ending or of another beginning. Either way, I'd leave it alone." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Soul's Grace
card.property: You gain life equal to target creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of fellowship and light.

card.name: Obelisk of Jund
card.property: {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Volcanic ash-winds batter it, climbing vines overwhelm it, dragonfire roasts it, and yet it still stands as a testament to a forgotten world.

card.name: Excommunicate
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rebels and other malcontents forced into the ritual awake lost in Topa's vast savannahs. Those who find their way back return humble and repentant.

card.name: Tar Fiend
card.property: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Tar Fiend enters the battlefield, target player discards a card for each creature it devoured.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.property: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

card.name: Dragon's Herald
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a black creature, a red creature, and a green creature: Search your library for a card named Hellkite Overlord and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The penultimate step of the ritual involves bathing in a delicious glaze.

card.name: Naya Battlemage
card.property: {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have trained in all three schools of magic."

card.name: Blood Cultist
card.property: {T}: Blood Cultist deals 1 damage to target creature. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Blood Cultist this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Cultist.

card.name: Gustrider Exuberant
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Gustrider Exuberant: Creatures you control with power 5 or greater gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves claim the canopy. The nacatl claim the mountains. I suppose you think we ought to stay on the jungle floor?"

card.name: Cradle of Vitality
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each 1 life you gained.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Naya's trees grow tall and sturdy. Their foliage intertwines to form dewcups, rainwater pools where the elves gather to celebrate life.

card.name: Rockcaster Platoon
card.property: {4} {G}: Rockcaster Platoon deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aven bandits can be sly. You've got to fill the sky with boulders—and then seek cover immediately." —Knight-Captain Wyhorn

card.name: Covenant of Minds
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If they don't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

card.name: Esper Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Draw two cards. • Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thoughts are commodities. Someone will pay a good price for them. Even ones as simplistic as yours . . ." —Ennor, mentalist

card.name: Flameblast Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon lords of Jund rule by edicts of flame.

card.name: Sedraxis Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Sedraxis Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Windwright Mage
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Windwright Mage has flying as long as an artifact card is in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She knows the names and secrets of each of Esper's twenty-three winds.

card.name: Sprouting Thrinax
card.property: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

card.name: Etherium Astrolabe
card.property: Flash {B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Speculation is foolish when the tools of certainty are available." —Cinna, vedalken consul

card.name: Tezzeret the Seeker
card.property: +1: Untap up to two target artifacts. −X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. −5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

card.name: Mindlock Orb
card.property: Players can't search libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rogue mechanists once rummaged through the wastes of the Tidehollow, constructing unauthorized golems to threaten the hegemony of the sphinxes. The orbs put a stop to that.

card.name: Welkin Guide
card.property: Flying When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those talons really dig into your skin, but it's better than being dropped." —Rafiq of the Many

card.name: Savage Lands
card.property: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

card.name: Sigil Blessing
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

card.name: Deft Duelist
card.property: First strike Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Serul Cove rogues traffic in stolen sigils, which fetch a high price from those who would rather pay for honor than earn it.

card.name: Esper Battlemage
card.property: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn. {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She can heal the flesh, or exploit its many weaknesses.

card.name: Blightning
card.property: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

card.name: Sarkhan Vol
card.property: +1: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn. −2: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. −6: Create five 4/4 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
card.property: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

card.name: Jund Battlemage
card.property: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of your blood I will make my mead, an offering to the thirsty jungle."

card.name: Etherium Sculptor
card.property: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

card.name: Jungle Weaver
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weavers' webs wall off swaths of territory more effectively than any portcullis made of iron.

card.name: Deathgreeter
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bones of allies grant wisdom. The bones of enemies grant strength. The bones of dragons grant life eternal."

card.name: Dawnray Archer
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {W}, {T}: Dawnray Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their shots are fired most often as signals—or at those who didn't get the message.

card.name: Marble Chalice
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cup was a gift from the sphinx Tameron, who hoped that those who drank from it would live long enough to decrypt the sphinxes' wisdom.

card.name: Mayael the Anima

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sacred Anima's eyes are blind to all but the grandest truths.

card.name: Protomatter Powder
card.property: {4} {W}, {T}, Sacrifice Protomatter Powder: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no such thing as scrap metal. All such material can be repaired with the proper bonding agent." —Quennus, metallurgeon

card.name: Bloodpyre Elemental
card.property: Sacrifice Bloodpyre Elemental: It deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals born of Jund are as cruel and unstable as the plane itself.

card.name: Courier's Capsule
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Capsule: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In ages past, Esper couriers bore messages written on ornate scrolls. The medium has grown more sophisticated, but the principle remains the same.

card.name: Coma Veil
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Etherium does not know sleep. Only magic can teach it the resting state of cold steel.

card.name: Ridge Rannet
card.property: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only those with the strength to seize their destiny deserve to have one." —Nacatl scratchforms

card.name: Crumbling Necropolis
card.property: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living." —Olcot, Rider of Joffik

card.name: Seaside Citadel
card.property: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.

card.name: Court Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sun-Dappled Court of Valeron stands secure behind a wall of steel-tipped arrows.

card.name: Spell Snip
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic cast through a hand of flesh is just as weak as the flesh itself." —Lodus of the Ethersworn

card.name: Godsire
card.property: Vigilance {T}: Create an 8/8 Beast creature token that's red, green, and white.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lay sacrifice to the godsire that it may spare us, but save some for his progeny who also will hunger." —Syeena, elvish godtoucher

card.name: Hell's Thunder
card.property: Flying, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hell's Thunder. Unearth {4}{R} ({4}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Salvage Titan
card.property: You may sacrifice three artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile three artifact cards from your graveyard: Return Salvage Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Grixis Panorama
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Grixis Panorama: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.

card.name: Battlegrace Angel
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Obelisk of Naya
card.property: {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries have passed since the plane shattered, yet the obelisks of each shard faithfully serve their long-forgotten purpose.

card.name: Feral Hydra
card.property: Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Feral Hydra. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.

card.name: Brilliant Ultimatum
card.property: Exile the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. You may play any number of cards from one of those piles without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Revealing the truth only deepened Tezzeret's curiosity for the secrets still buried.

card.name: Waveskimmer Aven
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest gift you can give a sea aven is solitude.

card.name: Predator Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Esper Panorama
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Esper Panorama: Search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper is an expansive canvas painted by precise, controlling hands.

card.name: Agony Warp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Resounding Roar
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Cycling {5}{R}{G}{W} ({5}{R}{G}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Resounding Roar, target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

card.name: Clarion Ultimatum
card.property: Choose five permanents you control. For each of those permanents, you may search your library for a card with the same name as that permanent. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Be worthy of a single blessing, and many more will follow.

card.name: Exuberant Firestoker
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may have Exuberant Firestoker deal 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The artistry of Etlan's firedancers is more spectacular when behemoths join in.

card.name: Violent Ultimatum
card.property: Destroy three target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words are a waste of time. Destruction is a language everyone understands." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Grixis Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many choices. Shall I choose loathing, hate, or malice today?" —Eliza of the Keep

card.name: Mosstodon
card.property: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether gargantuans are the manifested will of Progenitus or simply the result of overabundant resources is moot when a herd of them is thundering at you.

card.name: Skeletal Kathari
card.property: Flying {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Skeletal Kathari.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Undeath doesn't end the kathari's search for carrion; it only removes one corpse from the Dregscape.

card.name: Viscera Dragger
card.property: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sunseed Nurturer
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may gain 2 life. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sunseeders quest for areas of open sky. They train plowbeasts to beat back the dense jungle long enough to cultivate a crop.

card.name: Crucible of Fire
card.property: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Magma Spray
card.property: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Lush Growth
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Mountain, Forest, and Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Naya's bounty spills over upon itself. Each leaf and flower struggles against the next with thrashing thorns, acidic pollen, and strangling roots.

card.name: Sighted-Caste Sorcerer
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {U}: Sighted-Caste Sorcerer gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Vectis Silencers
card.property: {2} {B}: Vectis Silencers gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even on Esper, there are those who eschew the use of magic in favor of simpler methods.

card.name: Rafiq of the Many
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Rhox War Monk
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

card.name: Savage Hunger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Naya Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature. • Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in nature's core lies a potential unsullied by greed or civilization.

card.name: Cruel Ultimatum
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a greater power.

card.name: Vein Drinker
card.property: Flying {R}, {T}: Vein Drinker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Vein Drinker. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vein Drinker this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vein Drinker.

card.name: Banewasp Affliction
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The consuming undeath of Grixis terrifies the survivors of Vithia, but its fauna is just as fearsome.

card.name: Rockslide Elemental
card.property: First strike Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

card.name: Bull Cerodon
card.property: Vigilance, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It holds motionless vigil, watching Naya in silence through the screen of the whitecover. When it senses anything amiss, it launches forward with the uncanny sound of torn fog.

card.name: Jhessian Infiltrator
card.property: Jhessian Infiltrator can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Jhessian navy makes successful raids on Valeron's coastal towns thanks to their spies planted during peacetime.

card.name: Call to Heel
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

card.name: Prince of Thralls
card.property: Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is put into a graveyard, put that card onto the battlefield under your control unless that opponent pays 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are none alive that I cannot crush. There are none dead that I do not command."

card.name: Carrion Thrash
card.property: When Carrion Thrash dies, you may pay {2}. If you do, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viashino hunt in gangs called thrashes. Not all thrashes hunt the freshest game.

card.name: Memory Erosion
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail." —Lodus of the Ethersworn

card.name: Vithian Stinger
card.property: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to any target. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Empyrial Archangel
card.property: Flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Empyrial Archangel instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her wings are the prayers of the devoted; her sword, the despair of the vile.

card.name: Ad Nauseam
card.property: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.

card.name: Resounding Thunder
card.property: Resounding Thunder deals 3 damage to any target. Cycling {5}{B}{R}{G} ({5}{B}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Resounding Thunder, it deals 6 damage to any target.

card.name: Dispeller's Capsule
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself." —Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

card.name: Metallurgeon
card.property: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time I got there, the heart had stopped. Fortunately, I was able to replace it with something better."

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The idols of old are rich in minerals and magic. They are torn apart when nature aims to eat well.

card.name: Angelsong
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

card.name: Where Ancients Tread
card.property: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Where Ancients Tread deal 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never subtle nor cryptic is the reckoning of the mighty." —Mayael the Anima

card.name: Grixis Battlemage
card.property: {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vitals of Grixis who eschew undeath must scrape and scratch to retain their mortality. The result is a breed of inventive mages.

card.name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
card.property: {3} {G}: Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

card.name: Soul's Fire
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

card.name: Tidehollow Sculler
card.property: When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ooze Garden
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice a non-Ooze creature: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund has little necromancy. Instead, the flesh of its dead gives rise to algal fiends.

card.name: Executioner's Capsule
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

card.name: Hissing Iguanar
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viashino thrashes keep iguanars as hunting companions, giving them wounded captives as playthings.

card.name: Akrasan Squire
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant's armies are primarily composed of members of the Mortar caste, loyal commoners who haven't yet earned a sigil.

card.name: Manaplasm
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urak froze when he heard it. That was his first mistake. He turned and cast a dramatic ward spell. That was his last.

card.name: Goblin Assault
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Goblin creatures attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

card.name: Bant Battlemage
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A night attack will be easy. We'll make an air raid over the Akrasan border. Just get me some flint to light the war torches."

card.name: Rip-Clan Crasher
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you breathe, she will fight you. If you breathe fire, she must fight you.

card.name: Yoked Plowbeast
card.property: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is sacrilege to confine a gargantuan to the grinding of straight lines. I will pray that it remembers who is the master of this land." —Syeena, elvish godtoucher

card.name: Fatestitcher
card.property: {T}: You may tap or untap another target permanent. Unearth {U} ({U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Relic of Progenitus
card.property: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

card.name: Cloudheath Drake
card.property: Flying {1}{W}: Cloudheath Drake gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A permanent storm rages over the plain of Cloudheath, and drakes ride its currents—two reminders that some elements of Esper will not be controlled.

card.name: Jund Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Exile all cards from target player's graveyard. • Jund Charm deals 2 damage to each creature. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund pulses with raw energy, waiting for shamans to shape it into useful form.

card.name: Punish Ignorance
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Amateurish. Nearsighted. A waste of my time and everyone else's." —Indra, nullmage of Vectis

card.name: Tidehollow Strix
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scullers beneath Esper keep strixes as trained pets, and set them loose when a fare refuses to pay.

card.name: Cancel
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

card.name: Realm Razer
card.property: When Realm Razer enters the battlefield, exile all lands. When Realm Razer leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The behemoth roared, and the world was blasted free of empires and tyrants.

card.name: Kiss of the Amesha
card.property: Target player gains 7 life and draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a year, Akrasa holds a joust that draws knights and their leotaus from every nation on Bant. The prize is an Akrasan sigil, but the true reward is the angel's kiss.

card.name: Broodmate Dragon
card.property: Flying When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

card.name: Thorn-Thrash Viashino
card.property: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) {G}: Thorn-Thrash Viashino gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Skill Borrower
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is an artifact or creature card, Skill Borrower has all activated abilities of that card. (If any of the abilities use that card's name, use this creature's name instead.)

card.name: Algae Gharial
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Algae Gharial.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lurks just under the surface, using the algae-choked tar pits of Jund as both home and hunting blind.

card.name: Minion Reflector
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To crack a mirror is to provide an opening for the reflection to escape.

card.name: Scavenger Drake
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

card.name: Death Baron
card.property: Skeleton creatures you control and other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.
